name: TIRAMISU
description: The classic Italian dessert. Savoiardi fingers soaked in marsala and espresso, layered with mascarpone. Yum!

name: DEVILS DREAM CAKE
description: Soft layers of white and dark chocolate laced with raspberries – really wicked and scores 10 on the richness scale.

name: SUCCULENT SORBETS
description: A selection of refreshing mouth-watering sorbets made on the premises, served in a tuille basket.

name: STICKY DATE PUDDING
description: A traditional favourite, scented with cinnamon, nutmeg and clove served warm with vanilla ice cream and butterscotch sauce.

name: WARM RASPBERRY DRENCHED CHOCOLATE CAKE
description: A traditional French recipe, so moist it resembles a sunken souffle An intriguing mixture of raspberries and chocolate served warm with vanilla ice cream.

name: THE FAMOUS NZ PAVLOVA
description: A honey biscuit base filled with caramel and topped with freshly cut bananas, chocolate sauce and whipped cream.

name: BANAFFI PIE
description: Blend of apple, orange, apricot, banana & spirulina.

name: CARAMEL AND HAZELNUT TORTE
description: A hazelnut top with a gooey caramel middle and sweet pastry bottom served warm with vanilla ice cream.

name: CRÈME BRULEE
description: Baked vanilla bean custard served the traditional French way with caramelised sugar.

name: CHOCOLATE MADNESS
description: A delicious assortment of chocolate delights – a must for chocolate lovers!

name: CHOCOLATE AND ENGLISH TOFFEE PUDDING
description: Chocolate brioche and soft English toffee baked together to perfection, served with creme anglaise and vanilla ice cream.

name: VERY BERRY
description: An amazing assortment of berry treats. Cranberry cheesecake, black berry and crème brulee, boysenberry sorbet, blueberry friand and raspberry coulis – berrylicious!

name: BLACK FOREST TOWER
description: Layers of cherry, black berry and chocolate mousse encased in a chocolate wrap. New design on an old Kiwi Delight.

name: LEMON CHOCOLATE CHEESECAKE
description: Baked lemon cheesecake sandwiched between two rich chocolate layers. A favourite.

name: BAKED CRANBERRY CHEESECAKE
description: A classic German style cheesecake with cranberry and white chocolate.

name: LEMON MERINGUE ROULADE
description: A creamy light lemon filling in a soft meringue, rolled in toasted coconut.

name: WARM CHOCOLATE AND ENGLISH TOFFEE PUDDING
description: Chocolate brioche and soft English toffee baked together to perfection, served with crème anglaise and vanilla ice cream.

name: TRIO OF ICE CREAMS
description: Choose THREE of our delicious ice creams, made on the premises – chocolate, cookies ‘n coffee, honey hokey pokey, maple & walnut, passionfruit or licorice. Served to you in a sweet tuille biscuit basket.

name: TRIPLE CHOCOLATE BROWNIE
description: elicious and full of white and dark chocolate, served warm with chocolate sauce and vanilla ice cream.

name: FRESH FRUIT BOWL
description: Fresh seasonal fruit served with chocolate sauce and yoghurt.

name: CHEESE PLATTER
description: Don’t have a sweet tooth try something savoury for dessert. Blue, Brie and aged Cheddar, served with crackers and red pepper relish.

name: KIDS ICE CREAM
description: 2 scoops of ice cream with chocolate sauce & cream…
